title: Annihilation
review: I've reviewed this before and I stand by everything I said, but this time it gets a 9 instead of an 8. After seeing it the first time I was desperate to see it again, and when I did I was just as impressed, if not more. This proves the story is memorable and intriguing, its effects are far more than just a gimmick, and my prediction is that it will age very well.
